video.headline: Priscila Cachoeira lands vicious KO in first round
video.caption: UFC women's bantamweight Priscila Cachoeira lands a strong uppercut on Josiane Nunes, knocking her out in the first round.
video.title: Priscila Cachoeira lands vicious KO in first round

video.headline: Chidi Njokuani's huge knee leads to TKO win
video.caption: Chidi Njokuani lands a big knee on Elizeu Zaleski dos Santos in the second round and finishes him off with a ground-and-pound for the TKO win.
video.title: Chidi Njokuani's huge knee leads to TKO win
video.description: Chidi Njokuani lands a big knee on Elizeu Zaleski dos Santos in the second round and finishes him off with a ground-and-pound for the TKO win.

events.name: UFC Fight Night: Vettori vs. Dolidze 2

video.headline: Dolidze, Vettori exchange flurry of blows in final round
video.caption: Roman Dolidze and Marvin Vettori exchange a flurry of blows early in the last round as Dolidze wins by unanimous decision.
video.title: Dolidze, Vettori exchange flurry of blows in final round
video.description: Roman Dolidze and Marvin Vettori exchange a flurry of blows early in the last round as Dolidze wins by unanimous decision.
